name: Boston Technology Corporation
tagline: Your Partner in Digital Health Innovation
description:
Boston Technology Corporation (BTC) is a leading software solutions and services provider dedicated to helping enterprises adopt and leverage the power of digital transformation.  BTC’s depth of technical expertise in mobile, web and cloud-based technologies coupled with its focus on areas such as interoperability, clinical research and care management uniquely positions it to provide the healthcare industry with robust and elegant solutions across the continuum of care.
 
We partner with our clients from concept, design, and development through ongoing maintenance and management to deliver solutions that innovate areas of patient engagement, improve patient outcomes, digitize processes and enable IoT human interface applications, while being flexible, cost-effective and on target with their project goals. BTC also provides staff augmentation services, thereby providing end-to-end solutions and support for all of your tech needs.
 
Regardless of how your healthcare organization consumes technology, Boston Technology will help you innovate, manage complexity and risk, and deliver the digital tools you need to allow you to stay focused on your mission, and succeed
